content.prompt: The Audience Hall (apadana) at Persepolis reveals the vastness of the Persian Empire by

choices.label: including mythical creatures representing the four corners of the empire
including artistic styles and materials from the different cultures ruled by the Persians
being situated on a raised platform with a different level dedicated to each region of the empire
being situated on a hill amid temples representing the patron deities of the different regions of the empire

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
